author: deweese
msg: 1) Class and attribute selectors now work with sibling selectors.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed an NPE with some updates.
2) When an element is removed or CSS properties change all
next sibling elements are not repainted (unless a rendering property
truely changes as a result (think css '+' rules)).
3) Changes to the 'class' attribute now update the rendering

author: deweese
msg: 1) Parents no longer clear themselves when a child is added/removed (again :).
2) When using progressive paint you will no longer get harmless but
distracting compaints about threads being interrupted.
3) Avoided a potential stack ovflow issue in bounds calculations.
